item.title: 玻利维亚违约风险上升，穆迪将其评级进一步降至 "垃圾 "级
item.description: 周四，穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将玻利维亚的信用评级进一步下调至垃圾级，原因是国际收支危机加深，主权违约风险增加。【原文：Bolivia’s credit score was lowered further into junk by Moody’s Ratings Thursday on a deepening balance of payments crisis and increased sovereign default risk.】

item.title: 全球贸易战升温，穆迪上调违约预测
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）提高了对今年违约情况的预测，因为全球贸易战的升级越来越有可能拖累经济增长，并使融资变得更加困难。【原文：Moody’s Ratings is boosting its forecast for defaults this year as escalating trade wars globally are increasingly likely to weigh on economic growth and make financing harder to get.】

item.title: 曾经炙手可热的华尔街基金迅速解体，看不到救星
item.description: 杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）本周排除了救援任务，招致唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的愤怒，华尔街急需救命稻草，因为受关税影响的市场再次下滑。【原文：With Jerome Powell ruling out a rescue mission this week and incurring the wrath of Donald Trump, Wall Street is desperate for a lifeline as tariff-lashed markets slide anew.】

item.title: 赫兹寻求举借更多债务以增加资产负债表上的现金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，赫兹全球控股公司（Hertz Global Holdings Inc.【原文：Hertz Global Holdings Inc. is exploring ways to raise debt to bolster its balance sheet as it faces a potential payout to bondholders and to address looming liabilities, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 关税现实影响 "美国制造 "诉求，Snap-on 下跌
item.description: 工具制造商 Snap-on 公司因关税导致的销售下滑而蒙上阴影，创下一年多来的最大跌幅。【原文：Toolmaker Snap-on Inc. fell the most in more than a year after its made-in-America messaging was overshadowed by a tariff-driven sales slump, illustrating how even firms with diversified supply chains are being hurt by proposed levies.】

item.title: Roblox 和 Discord 因儿童安全问题受到各州审查
item.description: 佛罗里达州和新泽西州的官员正在仔细检查流行的视频游戏应用程序 Roblox 和 Discord，以解决儿童安全问题。【原文：Officials in Florida and New Jersey are scrutinizing popular video game apps Roblox and Discord over child safety concerns.】

item.title: 阿克曼称潘兴已持有赫兹 19.8% 的股份
item.description: 比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）的潘兴广场资本管理公司（Pershing Square Capital Management）已在租车公司赫兹全球控股公司（Hertz Global Holdings Inc.【原文：Bill Ackman’s Pershing Square Capital Management has amassed a nearly 20% stake in rental car company Hertz Global Holdings Inc., the billionaire said in a social media post.】

item.title: Generali 投资公司与合作伙伴共同发起信用二级市场基金
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份声明，资产管理公司 Generali Investments Holding SpA 和投资公司 Partners Group 将联手推出私人信贷二级市场基金。【原文：Asset manager Generali Investments Holding SpA and investment firm Partners Group are teaming up to launch a private credit secondaries fund, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 市场不平静之下，恐惧肆虐
item.description: 这是一种意想不到的、甚至是不可能的解脱。唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易战引发了恐慌，震撼了全球金融市场，并使人们对美国在世界上的地位产生了怀疑。【原文：It was an unexpected, if improbable relief. The panic unleashed by Donald Trump’s trade war, which convulsed financial markets around the globe and sowed doubts about America’s standing in the world, died down nearly as quickly as it began.】

item.title: 股票策略师以比大流行病更快的速度削减 S&P 目标
item.description: 华尔街的主要预测者正在下调他们对 S&P 500 指数 2025 年的展望，下调速度比大流行病开始时更快，尽管许多人仍然预计股市将在今年结束时走高。【原文：Wall Street’s leading prognosticators are cutting their 2025 outlooks for the S&P 500 Index at a faster pace than at the start of the pandemic, though many still expect equities to finish the year higher.】

item.title: 美国稀土矿商 MP Materials 停止对华出口
item.description: 在中国政府对国防和技术制造所需的类似材料实施出口管制后，一家美国稀土金属生产商停止了向中国发货。【原文：A US producer of rare earth metals stopped shipments to China after Beijing placed export controls on similar materials crucial for defense and technology manufacturing.】

item.title: 音乐产业对 "超级粉丝 "的关注与关税形成鲜明对比
item.description:
随着流媒体的增长放缓，唱片公司和流媒体商开始寻求从 T 恤和黑胶唱片等实体商品中获利

。【原文：

As streaming growth slows, record labels and streamers are looking to make money from physical goods, like T-shirts and vinyl records

】

item.title: 零售商将新涨价直接归咎于关税
item.description: 一家童车公司警告消费者，美国新关税导致的价格上涨不可避免，而一家环保清洁产品品牌则提供了一份逐项列出的价格上涨商品清单。与此同时，一家箱包零售商则将这种情况描述为 "一场彻底的垃圾场大火"。【原文：One stroller company is warning customers that price hikes due to new US tariffs are unavoidable, while an environmentally friendly cleaning-product brand is providing an itemized list of goods that are getting more expensive. A luggage retailer, meanwhile, has described the situation as “a complete dumpster fire.”】

item.title: 摩根士丹利聘用资深医疗保健银行家大卫-科斯特尔（David Kostel
item.description: 据知情人士透露，摩根士丹利已聘请资深交易员大卫-科斯特尔（David Kostel）担任其医疗保健投资银行部副主席。【原文：Morgan Stanley has hired senior dealmaker David Kostel as the vice chairman of its health-care investment banking group, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 鲁莫公司为巴西铁路扩建寻求合作伙伴
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，物流公司 Rumo SA 正在寻求合作伙伴，以扩大其在巴西的铁路业务和转运站。【原文：Logistics company Rumo SA is seeking partners to expand its railway operations and transshipment terminals in Brazil, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 光纤网络公司 Zayo 正与债权人商谈债务展期事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，光纤网络公司 Zayo Group Holdings Inc. 正在与贷款人指导委员会进行秘密会谈，以修改和延长其现有债务。【原文：Fiber-network firm Zayo Group Holdings Inc. is in confidential talks with a steering committee of lenders to amend and extend its existing debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Fortress 和 EdgeFocus 承诺为 SoFi 个人贷款出资 32 亿美元
item.description: 据一份声明称，SoFi Technologies Inc.已从Fortress投资集团和专注于人工智能的贷款机构EdgeFocus获得高达32亿美元的新承诺，用于发放个人贷款。【原文：SoFi Technologies Inc. has secured as much as $3.2 billion in new commitments from Fortress Investment Group and artificial intelligence-focused lender EdgeFocus to originate personal loans, according to a statement.】

item.title: Mitel 债务重组获批，"更高级 "诉讼案得以解决
item.description: Mitel Network 赢得了美国破产法院对重组计划的批准，该计划削减了超过 10 亿美元的借款，解决了 2022 年债务交易争议的诉讼，并将这家电信公司的控制权移交给了贷款人。【原文：Mitel Network won US bankruptcy court approval of a restructuring plan that cuts more than $1 billion in borrowings, resolves litigation over a contested 2022 debt deal and hands control of the telecommunications firm to lenders.】

item.title: 埃及自 2020 年以来首次降息，通胀得到控制
item.description: 埃及近五年来首次降低利率，这有可能刺激对经济反弹至关重要的投资，同时缓解中东地区一些国家最高的偿债成本。【原文：Egypt cut interest rates for the first time in almost five years, potentially spurring investment key to an economic rebound while easing some of the Middle East’s highest debt-servicing costs.】

item.title: 战神称渴望套现的私募股权投资者面临漫长等待
item.description: 战神管理公司（Ares Management Corp. ）收购业务主管表示，由于全球贸易动荡削弱了交易复苏的希望，私募股权投资者将不得不等待更长的时间才能从老基金中取回资金。【原文：Private equity investors will have to wait even longer before getting back their money back from older funds as global trade turmoil dims hopes of a deal revival, according to the head of Ares Management Corp.’s buyout business.】

item.title: 热门聊天机器人排名网站正在成为一家真正的公司
item.description: 聊天机器人竞技场（Chatbot Arena）是一个学术研究项目，其网站已成为访客试用新人工智能模型的热门场所。【原文：Chatbot Arena, an academic research project whose website has become a popular place for visitors to try out new artificial intelligence models, is turning into a company.】

item.title: 自由能源公司认为美国石油活动保持稳定，价格高于 60 美元
item.description: 美国最大的压裂公司之一自由能源公司（Liberty Energy Inc.【原文：Liberty Energy Inc., one of the biggest US fracking companies, expects most producers to stick with their production plans as long as crude prices can hang on near current levels.】

item.description:
Lunar, Saga 和Suikoden是今年复活的三个老牌 PlayStation 游戏系列

。【原文：

Lunar, Saga and Suikoden are just three of the old PlayStation franchises that have been brought back to life this year

】

item.title: 如果贸易谈判失败，欧盟将考虑对美国实施出口限制
item.description: 欧盟正在制定一项提案，对部分出口到美国的产品实施限制，作为对唐纳德-特朗普总统上个月发起的扩张性贸易战的一种可能的报复策略。【原文：The European Union is working on a proposal to introduce restrictions on some exports to the US as a possible retaliatory tactic in the expansive trade war President Donald Trump initiated last month.】

item.title: 日间交易者拒绝放弃最爱的痴迷：杠杆基金
item.description: 惩罚性的股票抛售和飙升的波动性无法让投资者远离市场风险最大的角落之一：杠杆式交易所交易基金。【原文：A punishing stock selloff and soaring volatility couldn’t keep investors away from one of the market’s riskiest corners: leveraged exchange-traded funds.】

item.title: Blackstone 将于五月推出面向日常投资者的信贷基金
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 面向个人的新信贷基金将于 5 月 1 日首次亮相，在公共市场动荡不安的时期，这将考验投资者是否愿意在债券之外涉足另类投资。【原文：Blackstone Inc.’s new credit fund for individuals is set to debut on May 1, testing investors’ appetite to venture beyond bonds into alternatives in a volatile time for public markets.】

item.title: SPAC 将利用 IPO 冻结的机会，爆发 10 亿美元交易
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税战重创了股票和债券，并关闭了传统的首次公开募股市场。然而，即使风险偏好受到抑制，最有可能从剧烈波动中获益的领域也是投机性最强的领域之一：SPAC 市场。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff war has hammered stocks and bonds, and shuttered the traditional IPO market. Yet even with risk appetite on hold, the area that could benefit most from the rampant volatility is among the most speculative: The SPAC market.】

item.title: 圣马可集团在巴西提出法外追偿计划
item.description: 巴西连锁超市 Grupo St Marche 已申请批准与其主要金融债权人谈判达成的庭外重组。【原文：Brazilian supermarket chain Grupo St Marche has filed for approval of an out-of-court restructuring negotiated with its main financial creditor.】

item.title: Pimco和T. Rowe利用美国证券交易委员会的转变推动节税基金的发展
item.description: 一种改变游戏规则的基金设计很快将获得美国证券监管机构的批准，这种设计将帮助资产管理公司减少客户的税费支出，并扩大 ETF 业务。【原文：Optimism is building that a game-changing fund design that will help asset managers shrink clients’ tax bills and grow their ETF businesses will soon be approved by the US securities regulator.】

item.title: 特朗普关税如何威胁美国服装价格上涨？
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发动的贸易战中，那些为美国人提供服装和鞋子的国家和企业受到的影响最大。【原文：Among the countries and businesses with the most at stake in the trade war unleashed by US President Donald Trump are those that supply Americans with their clothing and shoes.】
